field.label: Slug
field.comment: Navigate to WISMOlabs admin dashboard and copy "slug" value from Settings - Magento Connect app

field.label: Retailer ID
field.comment: Navigate to WISMOlabs admin dashboard and copy "Retailer ID:" value from Settings - Magento Connect app

field.label: Token
field.comment: Optional. Copy the "Authorization Token" from the Magento Connect section in your WISMOlabs admin dashboard. This token securely connects your Magento store to WISMOlabs, enabling features such as additional email, SMS, webhooks, and push notifications for shipment events like "Out for Delivery," "Delivered," and "Late Shipment." It also unlocks other advanced features, including marketing, analytics, and more.

field.label: Select Data Fields to Pass to WISMOlabs
field.comment: Hold the Option (‚å•) key (Mac) or Alt key (Windows/Linux) to select multiple fields. WISMOlabs already receives the minimum required data for basic features. Selecting additional fields will enhance WISMOlabs' marketing, personalization, and segmentation capabilities.

field.label: Include WISMOlab link into Shipping Confirmation email
Include WISMOlab link into the Order Confirmation email
field.comment: Use this setting carefully. It should only be set to 'Yes' if an authorization token is provided. Enabling this feature without proper configuration may result in a negative customer experience, particularly if the messaging in notifications does not align accurately with your order processing workflow.

field.label: Customize Email [Track My Order] Button
field.comment: This code is used in Magento email notifications. Customize it to match your brand. Be sure to include the {{WISMOLINK}} placeholder, which will automatically be replaced with the tracking URL.

field.label: Place WISMOlab link under customer's Order History pages
Use Mysql Queue
field.comment: Use MySQL for handling asynchronous tasks, like submitting order and shipment data to WISMOlabs. Warning: Set to 'No' only if you have queue service configured, as turning it off without one may cause data submission failures.

field.label: Enable detailed logging for debugging
field.comment: When set to 'Yes', this will add logs to var/log/debug.log with the Wismolabs_Tracking_Helper prefix, assisting in troubleshooting any issues.
